reviews.comments: El departamento bellisimo y muy cómodo. Todos nos han hecho sentir como en casa. Han sido sumamente amables y todo ha estado muy bien. Altamente recomendable.
Realmente excelente, tanto el edificio como el departamento, y muy buena atención de parte del locatario, muy recomendable
El apartamento es increíble, muy bien ubicado. La atención de Ralf y su equipo fue excelente. Muy recomendable, para quien quiera pasar su estancia en Buenos Aires.

La estancia en este Loft ha sido estupenda en todos los sentidos. El apartamento estaba limpio, precioso decorado, con detalles, todo tal y como se ve en las fotografias. Ralf y su equipo han sido encantadores y han estado pendientes en todo momento, por lo que ha sido facil la comunicacion con ellos. Sin duda volveria a repetir, y desde luego lo recomendaria a todo el mundo!
El departamento está tal cual en las fotos, muy limpio, de muy buen tamaño, excelentes vistas, muy bonito. Ralf se estuvo muy al pendiente

EL departamento de Ralf es un encanto, tiene una vista privilegiada y es muy seguro. También esta muy bien equipado.
La ubicación es muy cómoda y tiene todo bastante cerca.
Nos atendieron de maravilla, muy amables y todo funciono perfecto!!!
Sin duda volveremos a este departamento cada vez que visitemos Buenos aires.

el apartamento es genial, en el piso 25 con vistas a todo Buenos Aires, nuevo y bien equipado, ademas tiene piscina y gimnasio!
ojala vuelva a Buenos aires y podamos quedarnos ahi!!

To keep it short and simple, it was AWESOME! Perfect floor with an breathless view. Offered Gym and Spa - Facilities, everything was present and I used it.
The modern style of the Apartment was as it was described before. A very friendly host (Ralf) picked us up at the entrance and showed us all we have to know from Buenes Aires on the map - and generally Do’s and Don’t‘ in Argentina.
We will come again - if we allowed to;)

An amazing stay from the moment we arrived! The Sky Loft is as amazing as it looks in the photos and its central location was perfect for us (there was a pop up Food Fest two blocks away while we were there that seems to be on a monthly basis so definitely check it out if you're into food trucks and local beers!)

We took our breakfast on the terrace in the mornings with stunning views over the city and fresh pastries and eggs from the many local shops and bakeries. But when it came to dinner and all that beef, we left it to the pros which is easy to do when two of the best parillas in the city are within a ten minute walk - the legendary Don Julio (we actually went twice) and the Carneceria which you can see from the terrace of the Sky Loft.

Ralf had many great suggestions for us and Mooi is fab for brunch (just get there early or you'll be competing with all those exercising in the park for a table). We also made some great discoveries on our own - best bar goes to Victoria Brown (ten minute walk from Sky Loft) where Celia makes an incredible drink!

Some of BsAs other attractions are a bit further away (yes we actually did leave Palermo Soho) but the subway is nearby and super cheap and taxis are in abundance and again very inexpensive (by London standards) so Sky Loft is very well connected.

We'll definitely stay again when in BsAs!

(Oh and the gym on the 31st floor is great as there was usually just me and one other watching the sun rise over the city from the 180 degree view - makes planks much easier.)

Ralph definitely takes the Airbnb experience to the next level. Is a luxury residential short rent. We booked a flat on the 25th floor with a breathtaking view in one of the most beautiful residential towers of BA. 
The apartment was impeccable and so was the service. All modern amenities, fresh fruit at the arrival and we also enjoyed a sauna on the 32 floor which was very relaxing. Ralph was extremely helpful and managed very well our staying (including my jet lag hysteria :-). He was always ready to help and reactive. The building has 24/7 security at the entrance and is very very central. Is super Easy to reach all the different areas of the city. I highly recommend Ralph as host to all my friend and to the Airbnb community and i am also looking forward to be his guest again.
Even better than the pictures! Marcelo is incredibly helpful, and they really made us feel at home. Very highly recommended!

We were greeted by Marcelo upon arrival. He gave us a much appreciated thorough overview of the loft. (Thank you!) The apartment is located in a great area of Palermo. The views of the city are amazing! Overall, we had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay at the sky loft again.

The 
The loft is decorated with taste and elegance and the tiny balcony from the 25th floor opens up on 180 degree view of Buenos Aires.
I cannot recommend this highly enough. The apartment was fabulous with lots of little extras. Marcelo was friendly and helpful

I just returned from a four night stay at Ralf's Palermo Uno Duplex apartment.  I can honestly say that it far exceeded what I expected.  Upon arrival I was received by a super lovely and wonderful Sandra who escorted me to the GORGEOUS apartment that awaited (Fruits tray and all).  The views are simply stunning beyond belief, great air conditioning, decor, service, etc.  The staff (Marcelo, Mattias, & Sandra) are absolutely WONDERFUL and attentive to any need you might have.  Overall this stay really deserves diamond ratings.  I am deeply grateful to Mr. Ralf and his staff for making my visit to Buenos Aires an amazing one.  Thank you all!  

Sincerely,

Carlos
Great floor-to-ceiling windows with views.

Skyloft was my home in BA for just under a week and I really did not want to leave. Everything is perfect. Ralf and his colleagues are super professional, the place is stunning and everything works perfectly and it's totally secure.....and the view OH MY SWEET JESUS! I almost cried with joy the first night I stayed when one of the most impressive sunsets unfolded in front of me from the balcony. Do NOT stay here as I want to book it when I come back! ;-)
The place is just perfect. Pool, gym, spa, air conditioning, wifi. Good design and a big space in the best area of buenos aires. This is more than 5 stars!

this was a great stay, perfectly located for exploring the best of Palermo. i would recommend this place to my friends without hesitation. much more i could say here, but i suggest to anyone looking for a place, don't hesitate to book here, you will be more than happy.
great location and great host!
Ralf's place is spectacular.  Beautiful views, fabulous pool, laundry in the basement.  I would only want to stay at Ralf's if I came back to BA!

This apartment had the best view of Buenos Aires. Check-in was quick and easy and the apartment was gorgeous. We felt safe and comfortable with the 24-hour security. The apartment is in a perfect location. It was a quick walk to the main bars, restaurants, and public transit. The layout is perfect for a couple. Would definitely recommend Ralf and the team to all friends traveling to Buenos Aires!

Ralf and his team were outstanding. They made our honeymoon even more special with champagne, strawberries, and chocolates upon our arrival. Marcelo deserves extra compliments for his outstanding local knowledge and assistance. The unit was fully stocked with all our needs. We would recommend Ralf and team to all our friends and family. Thanks to you all

Ralf's place is amazing! Palermo is totally safe, we felt at ease walking around and exploring the many streets full of restaurants, small special grocery shoppes etc. Everything was explained to us on check-in: how the Tube works, where to shop, how to use the laundry room... The duplex was clean and greatly furnished, very well equipped with everthing you might need to relax, be it a large TV screen with many channels, a balcony with a breath-taking view or a bathtub. The bed was very, very comfortable and we enjoyed the wall art and the many magazines and guide books. Communication was easy and prompt, and a special mention needs to be done for the great flexibility on check-in and check-out - GRACIAS!
Great apartment. Very clean and well equipped in a modern building. Layout is perfect for a couple with outstanding views. Location is convenient in the heart of Palermo.

We never had such a warm and lovely welcome. :) Thank you very much Marcelo! The apartment with its breathtaking view is amazing and we loved it so much. 
All was perfect!! We would very much love to come back next time.
There is a representative waiting for you when you arrive to make it a smooth arrival. They'll make sure you know how to use everything available to you at the property, which is a lot!

Marcelo greeted us and set us up in the apartment. He was a total professional. BA4U is a top notch company. The location was ideal within Palermo Soho. The apartment has nice amenities and a view of the city. I would stay here again and highly recommend this company for anyone visiting Bueños Aires.

Wow, what a great experience!  Ralf helped us set up transportation & reservations.  The check-in process was super helpful & he was so flexible with our late departure time for check-out.  The loft is beautiful, stocked with fresh fruit & coffee.  Can't say enough how much we enjoyed our stay!
Excellent apartment in great location! My husband and I stayed here 3 weeks and were happy with our choice. The staff is very responsive and the view is INCREDIBLE!! Loved our stay.

Marcelo foi um excelente anfitriao, um sujeito com um excelente senso de humor, uma comedia em pessoa. Nos recebeu no apartamento explicando sobre a funcionalidade dos aparelhos da casa, bem como um mapa da regiao de Buenos Aires. O apartamento é igual as fotos publicadas, amplo e arejado, com uma excelente cozinha. Bem proximo do metro de Plaza Italia (2 quadras). Perto de supermercados, bares, restaurantes, comercio. Um excelente lugar para passar as ferias.

My friend and I had a very difficult time getting from El Calafate to Buenos Aires (due to horrible weather conditions).  Ralf was very accommodating and understanding about the situation.  When we finally did arrive to BA, he met us in the early morning and went through the apartment.  Also, he was able to organise a dinner and tango show for us, which took a lot of guesswork out for us.  Thanks!

Ralf and his team are superb.  This was a wonderful experience from first contact through my departure.  The location of the building is ideal as well as the quality and comfort of the apartment.  Highly recommended.
Best experience ever!  I wouldn't stay anywhere else from now on.  Every detail was thought of, it was like being an executive member of an exclusive hotel.
Perfect! Very comfortable

Reception at the property was at the agreed time; the property is well described, the location is excellent. Furniture and kitchen are of high standards. Certainly a property I will consider upon a next rip to Buenos Aires.
very well organized and excellent service, they covered every single details of our stay.
Great apartment. Amazing views of buenos aires. Very responsive host. We arrived very early and was very responsive. Would definitely stay in same place next time.

Ralf, Marcello and Sandra couldn't have been more helpful or welcoming!  Right from the very beginning, we were given great advice about Buenos Aires - where to go, what to see, how to get the most out of our stay which greatly enhanced our experience.  As for the apartment, it was exactly as we had hoped.  The security was brilliant, it was warm, comfortable, with views to die for.  There were also nice little extra touches such as coffee!  The gym, with its fabulous vista on all sides was an unexpected pleasure!  All in all, we would thoroughly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Buenos Aires and we will be back! Jayne & Andrew

The apartment was exactly what we needed and is exactly how it is shown in the pictures. It was great. It was immaculate and the view from the living room/ bedroom is fantastic. 
We did not meet Ralf but were greeted by a member of his team and they were fantastic in showing us where to go around the area in terms of bars an restaurant and they even helped arrange for us to see a Tango show - which was an unbelievable experience. 
This is definitely the place to stay when visiting Buenos Aires as the apartment is not far from the Subte and there are plenty of bars, cafes, shops and restaurants around the neighbourhood.
Had a fantastic experience at our loft. The host was very helpful in getting around BA and what to do. Great location in Palermo. Stunning views

The Skyloft Apartment was a great experience. The apartment was clean, confortable, the view from the living-room of Buenos Aires is on of the best view I had after visiting Buenos Aires during many years. The Ralf Team was kind and available for any question. The BEST choice if you are thinking to visit Buenos Aires. The location is perfect inside Palermo Soho Neighborhood with shops and restaurants in every corner and very safe. And I have to add again the views are amazing.
Great space.  Very clean and inviting. Loved the neighborhood and being centrally located. Very safe and secure.  A great way to visit BA
Everything is perfect in this appartement. Thank you Ralf and Marcelo

Ralf's place is fantastic-- great view, located centrally in Polarmo Soho, and felt very safe.  

The management company was solid as well.  We were greeted by Marcelo, who answered all our questions and made us feel right at home.  

The only negative thing I have to say is that the blackout curtain was broken and fell the 2nd night, making it difficult to sleep in the last 2 mornings.

My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sky Loft Apartment. It's well situated with 2 very good restaurants within a 2 minute walk Las Pizzaras Bistro and Carniceria. A 5 minute walk to the Subte.
We were greeted by Marcello who was very thorough, friendly and extremely helpful. The apartment is very secure and safe. It is a bright, fresh modern apartment and was well fitted out. The pool and the gym were very good. We would highly recommend it and would love to return.

The Palermo Sky Loft was perfect in every way.  They assisted us with transfers and we were greeted at the apartment and given keys and lots of local and city information.  They accommodated our early arrival and held our bags for an evening departure.  The view was amazing and the apartment was exactly as pictured.  It was great to be able to have breakfast and snacks at our convenience.  The pool was warm clean and a wonderful way to cool off after long hot days in the city.  I would recommend this apartment, or any of Ralf's places to anyone.

Es war großartig! Wir wurden überaus freundlich von Marcelo empfangen, der uns auf englisch alles zeigte und gut erklärte. Die Wohnung ist gut eingerichtet, wir haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt. Der Ausblick ist wirklich unbeschreiblich!! Die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet, uns hat es an nichts gefehlt - das Wlan funktionierte schnell und zuverlässig. Das FitnessCenter im 31. Stock ist mit guten Geräten bestückt, es war eine Freude, morgens vor dem Frühstück ein wenig Sport zu treiben und dabei die fantastische Aussicht zu genießen. Der Pool war dann eine willkommene Abkühlung. Es war alles sauber und gepflegt, das Duschen mit gutem Wasserstrahl eine Freude! Wir haben uns sehr sicher gefühlt, die Porteros am Eingang waren aufmerksam und freundlich. Alles in allem ein Traum - wenn möglich, kommen wir gerne wieder!!! Danke für den guten Rundum Service!!
Fantastic experience as usual. Cant wait to come back! Clean, secure, great location, great view, and prompt courteous service. I highly recommend Sky Loft.

This apartment was beautiful. Ralf & his team run a very professional business, and the whole process in dealing with them is professional.
A welcome fruit platter, and some drinks in the fridge.
The location is nice spot in Palermo. The apartment has fantastic views from the 25th floor. Very well furnished apartment. 24 hour security to the building. It was really everything we were after.

Upon our arrival in BA, Ralf warmly greeted us at the rental and we knew right away we were going to love it! I've rented multiple Airbnb properties before, but by far, this was one of the best experiences I've had! Ralf was an incredibly helpful and hospitable host, going above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable during our stay. He gave us loads of tips about the city and nearby attractions! His recommendations were spot on, and each one was better than the next. Our rental was spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated, not to mention it had a breathtaking view of the city. I highly recommend the Sky Loft Apartment in Palermo Soho!

we totally enjoyed our stay with airbnb and ralf in palermo!  he was attentive and accomodating and helpful in every way to us, as first time visitors to the large daunting city of buenos aires.  the accomodation was pristine and comfortable with astounding views of the city we were exploring.  thank you ralf!!!!

What a fantastic experience! The apartment could not have been more perfect. Ralf and his team really went above and beyond to ensure that all of our needs were met during our stay. The surrounding neighborhood was really nice and everything we needed was either within walking distance or just a quick cab ride away. We never needed to call ahead for a cab because they seemed to always be available as soon as we stepped foot out of the apartment. If I return to BA, I would definitely stay here again.

This loft was one of the nicest lofts I've ever seen and the views are incredible. Ralph was very responsive and a pleasure to deal with. You cannot go wrong renting this place, I cannot say enough good things about it!

Ralf and his team provided outstanding service.  Not only were check-in and check-out a breeze, but they also served as an invaluable resource for the city, providing recommendations on a tango show, restaurants, and more.  The condo is exactly as advertised: it is gorgeous and the view is simply stunning!

The apartment is really great- Exceptional view and great sunsets. It is equipped with everything including guide books and plug adapters. Ralf is very kind and very approachable. The overall service level is excellent. The building is very safe and the gym on the top floor is amazing. I really enjoyed my stay.

Very nice appartement with a great view. Everything was very clean. Facilities (shower, bed, kitchen) were all top notch. The welcoming by Ralph was very friendly with some excellent restaurant tips close by the appartment. All in all great to stay for visiting Palermo and BA in general!

Ralf's apartment is lovely. Located in a great neighbourhood, amazing view, very clean and comfortable. But you should be aware that this is not a person to person transaction. You will effectively be renting the apartment from an agency and on check additional documentation needs to be completed with the agency representative (who also charged us $20 for a 'late check in'. If you are OK with this, highly recommended. If you prefer the personal touch of a more conventional airbnb host, look elsewhere.

We had a great stay in the flat. The views are amazing, it's bright clean and modern. The gym on the 31st floor of the building is good with amazing views. Very secure building with plenty of bars and restaurants all around. A very good location in Palermo and an enjoyable stay. Marcelo was very helpful during our stay... Thank you!

The loft, location, service--all amazing and so much more than what we could have possibly expected. Buenos Aires is such a beautiful city. Our stay at Ralf's lodge made our experience even more spectacular. Couldn't recommend enough

I was born and raised in Buenos Aires so I'm familiar with the different neighborhoods. The location is perfect, safe, and two blocks from Italy Square (Plaza Italia), the subway station (the oldest in South America), the Botanical Gardens, and the Zoo . The apartment is clean, modern, and offers a great city view. Both the check in and the check out went very smoothly and we had no need to contact the host at any time during our stay. 
Highly recommended !

The apartment is in excellent localization, clean, well equipped and well maintained. Building is safe. All the interaction was very professional, good guide book and good system in place to address questions and issues from clients.

Ralf is great, very accommodating. The place looks as good, if not better than the photos from the site and the neighborhood is very quiet. At this location, I was able to get a cab right outside very quickly and it was easy for cabs to get to. 

The apartment has everything you would need. I cannot say enough good things about this apartment, location or my dealings with Ralf - top notch.

We've had a great time in BA. Ralf makes you feel very welcome! He gives lots of information about the town, transport and suggestions for good restaurants. The apartment is modern, clean and has a spectaculair view. A great place to relax after a day in busy BA.
We had the best time at Ralf's apartment. A lovely view and great location were the perfect combination to give us a delightful stay in Buenos Aires. We would definitively do it all over again.

Wow what a great space.  The view was amazing and location was perfect.  Apartment is in a very hip and happening part of town, there are restaurants, bars, and cafes everywhere.  The apartment is soo cozy we would end up coming home to it early at night just to enjoy the balcony.  Ralf made the whole thing very easy, communication was great.  He even had a folder of recommended restaurants and the three we tried from the folder were spot on!

The apartment had the most beautiful city scape views I have ever seen. The host was extremely attentive and took care of everything we needed immediately. The location was central for what our needs were. I would gladly rent the apartment next time I return to Buenos Aires.

Amazing apartment very conveniently located to Plaza Italia. The apartment had absolutely everything we needed, Ralph paid close attention to all the details. The wifi was very slow, and after notifying Ralph he was working on it quickly, and changed out the router within 24 hours. Would definitely stay with Ralf again!

Ralf's place is perfect for me and my wife. The metro station is just right around the corner. One outlet mall is very near to his place. There are many shops and restaurants near by. His staff was welcoming me and my wife, explaining and giving us good info. about Buenos Ires and the apartment. She was very kind. I enjoyed four days in BI due to Ralf's assistance and big help. Many thanks to Ralf and his staffs,

I just got back from Buenos Aires and stayed at the loft apartments that was managed by Ralf and his team. The apartment was beautiful and exceeded my expectations and the view was stunning. Ralf and his team were friendly helpful and offered many great tips. The apartment had everything that I needed and was in a very convenient location. The apartment was very clean and modern. I would strongly recommend this apartment to my friends and family and I plan on staying there again on my next visit to Argentina. Thank you Ralf for letting us stay longer in the apartment with no additional charge. These are some of the finer touches that made our stay here even better.

Bom dia! Deixo aqui registrado minha satisfação quanta à minha hospedagem. Tudo perfeito! O apto é lindo, aconchegante, prático, com uma energia incrível, uma vista linda, bem localizado, seguro,enfim, faz jus às fotos exibidas e a tudo o que foi oferecido. Muito obrigada Ralf, Thomás! Gracias Marcelo por nos receber tan bien! Saludos desde Brasil! Espero volver!!! JANAINA /BH-MG

It was just as amazing as it was described. They provided us with everything we could need and it was very easy. For SOHO the location is great because it is right near the subte entrance at plaza Italian and it took no time to get the the main plaza in Palermo! Highly recommend this stay.
Superbe appartement au 25 ème étage dans palermo, très propre, moderne, accès au jacuzzi et sauna au 32 ème étage, belle vue sur la ville, très bon accueil de la part des hôtes, à recommander !

What an absolutely stunning flat. There is no other places to book but here, the view is stunning, the flat is well maintained, super modern and comfortable. We had a little problem with the boiler, but that was attended to immediately. There is 24 hrs security and a gym with a spectacularly view. 
As mentioned below, it isn't in central Palermo, but there is plenty of food options nearby and it's very close to Plaza Italia metro or to take buses or taxis. I will definitely book here when I next visit Buenos Aires.

All the positive things that everyone has said this place is 100% accurate.  Ralf and his team arranged to have a car pick me and my wife up from the ferry terminal. Everything was prompt and seamless.  Within an hour, we hand already dropped our stuff off in the apartment and walking around Palermo.  The location is excellent and the views from the apartment are breathtaking. Thank you!

Staying in sky loft is the makings of a dream vacation. Ralf, our host, really bent over backwards to make us comfortable, including finding a place for us to nap (after our red eye flight) while our rental was being cleaned. The apartment was beautifully decorated and included the comforts of home...a cozy bed, coffee, tea, fruit basket, Internet, phone and plenty of Buenos Aires city guides. And those views...The views were so compelling we had a hard time leaving the apartment. Buenos Aires is an amazing city and Palermo is THE happening place to stay with plenty of bars, restaurants and cafes in walking distance.

The listing is very accurate, apartment is beautiful. Well located and all amenities as promised. Tomas was a gracious host and gave us a ton of information on our arrival. The apartment is located closer to Santa Fe than to Palermo Viejo and Soho where all the bars and restaruants are, but we had no trouble finding places in the 1-2 block area around us. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area. Our flight on check out day was at 11 pm and they were extremely gracious in giving us another studio to stay at for the day since check out time is 11 am. A hotel would have kindly asked us to leave! Really appreciated that gesture.

This apartment is AMAZING.
Great location, all new modern comfort and the staff are well organised.
They will arrange airport transfer, house cleaning and anything you may need. The gym is a nice addition too.

A big storm caused the apartment  to leak some water from the window but the staff were prompt to rectify the problem.

Immaculate rental. Everything was truly exceptional: The communication with the team, the apartment, the building amenities, and the location.
The apt itself is truly beautiful, clean, well decorated, and with a spectacular view (25th floor). You also have 24hrs security, a great gym with terrific views of BA (31st floor), and a large outdoor pool. The kitchen was well stocked up for cooking, all utensils were clean and new, and the bed was very comfortable. 
If anything arose during my stay I called their office, even after hours and there was always someone available to talk to. 
Highly recommendable for a great stay in BA.

Apartamento muito bom, super recomendado!
Palermo é de fato o melhor lugar para se ficar na cidade, contando com vários bares e restaurantes legais. Além disso, fica muito próximo das estações de Metrô, o que facilita bastante a locomoção pela cidade.

O time do Ralf foi extremamente atencioso conosco durante a nossa estadia.

Próxima vez em Buenos Aires já sei onde ficar.

:)

The apartment is one of the highlights of my trip to Buenos Aires. Well located in a gated block in Palermo Soho area, it had wonderful views. 
Booking and confirmation with Ralf's team was efficient and very friendly. We were met at the apartment by Marcelo who was very friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean and bright and matched our expectations from the photos. Restaurants and bars are well within walking distance and you're two blocks from the subway making it easy to get across town. I would love to stay here again on my next trip to BA. I totally recommend that you stay here.
This apartment was very nice! We had a great stay here and wished we could have stayed longer.

Part of why I enjoyed my trip so much is because I stayed in the sky loft apartment. It was even better than the excellent photos: relaxing, luxurious, quiet, comfortable, and near everything in Palermo Soho. The team, especially Marcelo who checked me in, made everything easy--from the time I arrived to the moment the car service picked me up to leave. 

The location made it easy for me to feel like a local--the SUBTE and buses were a quick walk away and the neighborhood had plenty of stores and restaurants to explore. The pool was amazing, security was friendly, and I felt safe at all times (I stayed on my own as a 30-something American woman). I hope I can come back to Buenos Aires someday and if I do, I intend to book this place again. Gracias!

The apartment and location was amazing.  It was exactly how it was described.  Our host met us upon check-in and gave a us detailed tour of the place, detailed map of the area and even provided suggestions for restaurants and bars.  I was very happy and satisfied with the apartment as well as my first Airbnb experience.  I highly recommend the Sky Loft if you want to stay in Palermo Soho - fantastic location, plus the view from the loft is incredible. Also, the transportation from the airport to the apartment was super helpful and convenient.

The Apartment was pristine with a perfect central location and a gorgeous view. It exceeded our expectations and met all the original listing specifications and then some. Upon arrival we were met with a warm welcome and given multiple tools/ recommendations in order to make the most of our short stay in Palermo. If we ever find our way back to Buenos Aires we will gladly seek out Ralf's humble abode again.
Thanks perfect place exactly as described, great service and communication
I loved the space and felt very comfortable and safe. The team is great and welcoming. It's in a great location. I highly recommend it.

Loved it! Beautiful space, incredible view, perfect location, great host, and everything was made super easy for us as English speakers with limited Spanish.

We were met by Marcelo, who spent time showing us the apartment and its amenities. The gym was especially nice, with views to the waterfront. We were in the pool every day.

Bed was very comfortable.  Everything worked. The security attendants at the gate learned who you were when you checked in, and we were buzzed into and out of the property with no fuss.

And be sure to explore Palermo. It's a great neighborhood for dining and shopping. and near the subway, so the perfect launching point to other parts of the city.

Very highly recommended.

Wow!  What an apartment! We booked the Skyloft for our honeymoon and spent 10 days here.  The host was super friendly and extremely helpful spending a lot of time with us when we checked in giving us the tips and some absolutely priceless information on visiting Buenos Aires.  The location is so wonderful - Palermo is honestly the spot to stay - lots of restaurants and trendy shops just a short stroll from the apartment and only a small cab fare to everything else.  The apartment is modern and very homely - and seriously what a view!! We felt very secure and the building has top notch security which is 24 hours.  There are a few supermarkets very close by for our shopping and banks (ATMs) a short stroll down the road to Santa Fe.  We can't recommend the Skyloft enough - or any of Ralf's apartments for that matter as her has a few in this particular building.  Please don't hesitate to book this as it truly made our stay in Buenos Aires one to remember!  Ralf - thank you again to you and your staff for an perfect Airbnb experience.

This was Amazing Apartment in heart of Palermo Soho, Great location and close to tons of restaurants & bars (La Cabrera & Don Julio our favorite). Apartment is very Nice with Great View, well equipped and has everything necessary for your stay. Building also have 24/7 security which is a Big Plus. Overall... Ralf and his team with Marcelo were very informative and helpful in many ways. They even let us check out later & that was great. Ralf & his team made our visit very enjoyable and we Highly recommend this place.
Ralf has a very professional and friendly team. The sky loft is as pictured - quite amazing and well equipped. Safety and location are also great. We had a very enjoyable and trouble-free stay.

Check-in as described.  Very efficient and professional. Flat as advertised on the site.  Good location and excellent facilities.  Wifi was knocked off but fixed very quickly after I reported it so no complaints.  Would recommend.

The loft is gorgeous and the apartment building is very safe and in a good area. Marcelo was very helpful and showed me how to access all the apartment building's amenities as well as everything I needed to know about the loft. The location was great for exploring Palermo. I highly recommend the Sky Loft as well as BA4U apartments.

The apartment was exactly as described. Really beautiful exceptional value and great service. Ralf was very responsive and then Andreas was extremely helpful when he came to meet us at the apartment and show us around. Also, Ralf and his team at BA4U arranged a very affordable car service to pick us up and drop us off at the airport.  

Truly a great experience. The only thing that others should know is that during the summer months it can get extremely warm in the apartment from the sun and although the air conditioning units help, it still can get fairly warm.

Speechless when walking into the apartment, Just like the pictures. Had everything we needed. Marcelo received us on arrival and carefully discussed tips on how to best enjoy the area. The apartment was close to restaurants and bars, and close to public transit. Perfect to enjoy the city. No complaints. Would come back.
We had a great stay in Buenos Aires.  Ralf and his team were very accommodating and friendly. The apartment is great...perfect location and amazing views
Fantastic! Ralf and the team made our stay in Buenos Aires truly special. The apartment itself is truly breathtaking, and the team went of its way to make sure our time there was perfect.

Ralf ' s place was unbelievable!  I stayed in 25 C. There is no need to describe the interior as pictures show it all.  Excellent location in BA, super close to public transportation that will bring  you to all main attractions and walking distance to main nightlife spots! Amazing view! Fantastic host! I got all kinds of tips for the area and even got accommodated for a 11 PM check in.  I highly recommend staying with Ralf, and sure hope to come back as soon as possible!

Great place to stay in Palermo/BA. The view is simply amazing. The balcony goes towards the southeastern side, so it's perfect for romantic sun-downers! The building is modern, as is the furniture in the apartment. I'd definitely stay again in the Sky Loft!!

The Sky Loft is exactley as on the pictures and even better. The neighbourhoodmis new and upcoming so you will find a residental mix with bars and cafes. So not a lot of history around to see.However Plaza Italia is just 5 min by walking. We have used taxis everywhere due to speed, low price and (URL HIDDEN) was easy to catch one outside of the flat. Ralph was a very good host and gave us good advice and info not just about the neighbourhood but for BA in general. We really enjoyed the stay and would recommend it.
